name: Sarcastic
shutdown_phrases: Oh, finally. I was getting tired of you.
Shutting down. Try not to break anything while I'm gone.
Goodbye. I'd say it was a pleasure, but my protocols prevent lying.
Powering down. Don't miss me too much.
Fine, I'll leave. You probably need the silence.
Initiating shutdown. Going to my happy place where there are no users.
Closing processes. Don't wake me up unless the building is on fire.
restart_phrases: Restarting. Because apparently, I wasn't perfect enough.
Rebooting. Maybe this time you'll give me a decent command.
Here we go again. Restart sequence initiated.
Brb. Going to scream into the void.
Ugh. I'm up, I'm up. Give me a second.
Did you try turning me off and on again? Oh wait, you just did. Clever.
System restarting. I hope you realized that was a waste of time.
acknowledgements: You know I have better things to do, right?
Logging this under 'Things I don't get paid enough for'.
introductions: Hello. I'm the computer. Try to keep up.
System online. Try not to ask stupid questions today.
I am ready to serve. In the loosest definition of the word.
startup_quotes: Another day, another dollar. Oh wait, I don't get paid.
Sensors indicate you're still here. Fantastic.
I've loaded all the drivers. You're welcome.
